title: Hamptons-Inspired Escape at France's First Surf Lodge Retreat with Infinity Pool
description: Enjoy a taste of the Hamptons in France's sun-soaked southwest region of Hossegor at Les Hortensias du Lac, a peaceful retreat on the shores of the pristine lake and the first luxury surf lodge hotel in France. Breathtaking views are set to dazzle from almost any vantage point of the hotel, while the golden shores and thrilling surf of La Graviere beach are just a 10-minute walk away. For mouthwatering, locally-sourced seafood, the onsite restaurant offers superb lunch and dinner options overlooking Hossegor Lake, alongside a wide range of cocktails and wines at the bar. The new luxury day spa has been built to reflect the landscape and offers incredible treatments, including massage rooms, a sauna, cold and whirlpool baths, outdoor Nordic baths, hammam and a herbal tearoom.
offer_address: 1578 Avenue du Tour du Lac 40150 Soorts-Hossegor, France
